ABOUT ME

I'm a full stack web developer who believes technology should have a conscience. In addition to the above projects, I also contribute to open source. You can find some of my work on Github and LinkedIn.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy reading, playing trumpet, piano, and guitar, and traveling the world.
